mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, password, nickname, point, positions_id, address_id) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{point}, #{positionsId}, #{addressId})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId})
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM member WHERE nickname = #{nickname})
